content.detailedDescription: From about 1 am on november 8, 2014 i noticed a bright flashy platform like object hovering somewhere in the area of the nuclear plant located in russellville ar about 20 or so miles from my residence. it emitted multi coloured lights as it stay stationary in the sky. for the next following 2 hours i would check on it periodically and aroud 3 am it ascended a flight path over my house and was completely outta view within 3 minutes. object had no sound and had a strange electro magnetic like feeling pulsate trough my body as it flew over me. i see this thing all the time but this time it took off. also been tracking 6 or so star like objects that appear over the mountain to the north of my home. they "come on" at about 7 pm and remain there still in the sky until the sun comes up. i have been watching these objects for 6 months now and they still have not moved! i have flown several robinson aircraft in my life and the phenomena i have witnessed over the past 1.5 years completely eludes explanation. they defy what we as human beings have come to believe as the theory or relativity and defies gravity and the laws of enersia (if beings are onboard). neighbours and i discuss week to week sightings often. any help understanding the sightings would be most appreciated. thank you all so much for offering a place to report and for all your hard work and follow ups. we deserve the truth and its people like you that get us one step closer everyday!
content.summary: Bright platform like object hovering over the nuclear plant. also 6 star like objects in sky haven't moved in over 6 months

content.detailedDescription: While my wife and i were taking our dog for a walk she suddenly said, whats that? i looked up and saw about a dozen small red lights coming from the northwest traveling slow. i said i'm going to get a camera and ran back to the house and grabbed my camera and cell phone. by the time i got back they had all vanished. within minutes another group of about nine came out of the north, by the time they got overhead they all disappeared at about the same spot. i tried to take pictures but could see nothing in the viewfinders. there was a third wave of 3 that did the same thing. i called 911 but heard no feedback after the report. they were all headed the same direction at the same speed and all disappeared in about the same place. my wife was visibly scared, i was mystified. what could that have been.
content.summary: Small red/orange lights that blinked like stars

content.detailedDescription:
We all saw a strange object floating slowly and with a diffuse light, different, and he was gone, disappeared at a certain point. were confused and to our surprise another identical object came next and disappeared at the same point. 

unblinking, made no noise, its light was all equal, milky white.

an object was too weird but two objects would be impossible. we wondered whether it would be a portal or something because they do not accelerated, it was as if they had crossed a wall. surreal.

this city is in the middle of the famous wetland brazil, the bolivian border and are reported several cases in the region.

in 1969 was dawn when my mother looked at the sky and saw a huge light, loud, and several lights that drifted in and out of that greater light. in the same city.

i realized that the sightings map no notifications in the region and did not understand because it is an area with many sightings stories.

aj gevaerd is a famous ufologist that region and can help in statistics and maps.

thank you.

jeisa araújo
content.summary: We all saw a strange object floating slowly and with a diffuse light, different, and he was gone, disappeared at a certain point. were confused and to our surprise another identical object came next and disappeared at the same point.

content.detailedDescription: Many years ago i was with a friend of mine traveling in arizona at about 1am. the night was crystal clear and we were traveling about 80 mph. this was around 1974 speed at your own risk. the road was straight as an arrow. with our car lights you could see about one quarter mile front and back of us.There was no way on or off the 2 lane highway because of guard rail on each side of the road. suddenly my friend started to slow down because he saw a car coming up fast behind us.I said don't worry there is no speed limit but he slowed anyway.  as the object got closer he put his hand over the rear view mirror because the light was getting very bright as the object got closer. then the object was right on our bumper and the lights were blinding. there was no sound. me being in the passenger side i began to turn aroud to my left. my friend said don't do that it will look suspicious,  he still thought it could be a cop but i knew it was not. as i turned i saw a big round light that was on the left side of the back of the car go up in the air with a smaller light under it. this looked to me the way a helicopter would take off. at that moment i yelled stop the car and a second later jumped out of the door as the car was still moving. i looked in the direction of where the object went and saw nothing or heard nothing. with our car lights you could see perfectly in every direction around the road. so i do not know what it was but know it was not a car, plane or helicopter.  and again there was no noise what so ever. this event happened 40 years ago but feels like a minute ago. we just looked at each other and drove off.
content.summary: Driving at 1am something followed our car very close. bright lights , no noise then flew away

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was on holiday in cornwall, i was watching the sky hoping to see a comet.
2 it was a very bright white round light that came extremely fast and stopped above me with no deceleration.
3 i had no idea but i was going through what it could be but nothing i knew of could do that.
4 the first came from the horizon extremely fast and stopped above , there was no deceleration it just stopped, the second came from another direction and stopped next to the first one, after a few moments one went across the horizon with no acceleration but was gone in a couple of seconds, the second did the same about 10 seconds later in another direction.
5 i was baffled, i was in the air force working on aircraft and i couldn't think of anything that could do that, i just sat and watched them and kept looking for a while after to see if there would be any more.
6 when they disappeared over the horizon
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light came from the horizon and stopped abruptly above me, another came from another direction and also stopped next to the first. after a short time one shot off  and disapeared over the horizon, the other followed moments later an another direction

content.detailedDescription:
Was waiting for a bus at a local bus shelter  along with young couple and there 5/6 yr old child    the couple were talking amongst them selves noticed the young child staring at the sky   so i looked up to my left    and  noticed  2 shimmering orb like balls  maybe few hundred ft apart from each other.
first of all thought it was   late fireworks going of  then noticed how they seem to dart around the black sky together,
by this time the young couple  had noticed them after seeing there daughter point to the sky.
i amno expert at distances  but i say they were at least  a mile away    either above the local woods or over motorway,(  there is a woods area  with a motoway behind it.
where i live you can see planes going and to  from cardiff airport   also you get police helicopters  flying over    soi am, used to these
but  i couldnt observe any longer as our bus pulled up and we got on it.
my first experience of orbs    hopefully not the last
content.summary: 2 orbs  observed  dancing in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Took this picture while testing a hd cam pro app on my samsung galaxy s4 at 15.30 on 24/11/14 in billinge, wigan, lancashire
the anomaly shot across the sky from the direction shown in picture (1), i managed to get a shot of it when it stopped it was green in colour and looked like it was pulsating which is much more clear on the original phone picture, it then moved to the second position in picture (2). before i could get a third picture it went straight up and out of sight.
whatever this was it moved at incredible speed with no sound whatsoever.

regards

[name removed /cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Took this picture while testing a hd cam pro app on my samsung galaxy s4

content.detailedDescription:
19.11.2014 6:30 pm - i was outside of my house with my daughter.Suddenly both of us saw firstly one object and immediately the second near the first one. they flue by the circle trajectory. sometimes they were coming close one to another.Lights were blinked like two times before. all was
too usual. i filmed them during 10-15 minutes and came back home. two ufo were stay in the sky.
after approximately one and half hour i went to another side of netanya. sky was clear. but suddenly one of " triangles' appeared over me. he flew to south from north with low speed but no one of it's lights was blinking! thais object also saw my sun( 15 years old) i watching that objects almost for three year but such type of flight still didn't see.Is it tr-3b? why it fly so much time over israel?
content.summary: During three hours ufos were observed in the sky over the netanya city.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 6pm 22 nov 2014 while exiting a store at the corner of 20th st se and south lake stevens road i and my wife noticed a series red lights in the western sky drifting from the south to the north. we think we counted 12 but it could have been more.  they were at an angle of about 20 degrees above the horizon  at maybe an altitude of 1000 to 2000 feet with a couple considerably lower.  the distance between the lights were about 1/4 mile. they traveled at an apparent speed of less than 10 mph.  a later check of the local winds at the time indicated they were mostly south at 5 to 10 mph. we did not notice any of the lights in view going out.  we left the area before they had all drifted out of view.

i believe that these lights may have just been lighted balloons or similar objects released from some event.  a check of local news reports on the 23 nov did not list any other sighting reports.
content.summary: Series of primarily red lights traveling north slowly at mostly same altitde.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten up for a drink of water in the middle of the night...When i glanced at the clock it was 3:00 am.  after i got the water i looked out my living room window (which i often do to look at the stars) and saw an object hovering above the mountain range the window looks out upon.  what caught my eye was the size of the object...Much larger than a star, and alternating colors through red to orange to yellow to white then back to red.  i enjoy looking at the stars and am somewhat familiar with the night sky (even took an astronomy class in college)... so i knew this could not be a planet and was too large to be a star.  there was not sure if there were radio/cell towers on the mountain, but this was too high and too large as well.  i considered it being a plane or satellite, but it did not show movement.

out of curiosity i went to my computer and searched the internet for anything that might explain the light, and found nothing.  i got a snack and 30 minutes later (at 3:30 am) i checked out the window again, and the light/object was still in the same position.  if it had been a star or planet, the rotation of the earth would have changed it's position.  if it was a plane or satellite or object in orbit, it would also have changed it's position.  it had not....It was still in the same position above the mountain range....Still flashing/changing colors as before.  in addition, the colors were very vivid and bright, and the color change was total...It wasn't fading in and out, or gradually changing color, it was one solid color, then another, then another....Seemingly in a pattern.  at that point i went back to bed since i had to be up for work in a few hours and the object didn't seem to be changing any, just stationary and changing colors.  i considered that it could have been a helicopter, but it would had to have been extremely large to appear the size i saw from the distance i saw it. in addition, i grew up next to an air force base and this did not resemble anything i had seen before.  i even stuck my head out the door and listened to see if i could hear any noise the object was making, but did not hear anything.

the next morning when i awoke, i immediately when back to the living room window and did not see anything above the mountain range which could have explained the object/light.  no cell/radio towers, nothing.  in addition, it was a cold, crystal clear night as was the morning after.  i did another internet search that day and in the following days after and did not find any reports of any kind that resembled what i saw or could explain what i saw.
content.summary: Saw object consisting of flashing lights, larger than star, stationary above mountain range

content.detailedDescription: A late august night my family and i were headed back home to clinton missouri, it was around 11pm at night and me and my two brothers were riding in the back of our family station wagon with my mother and my step father at the time riding in front headed down 50 hwy when all of a sudden it was like everything went dead silent and all the cars on the road disappeared and we couldn't hear the car or anything it was like time stood still then a bright light shined down on our car my mom tried telling us to keep calm its a helicopter spot light to keep us calm, we all knew something wasn't right and the light got brighter to the point were it seem like someone was shining flood lights in every single window and got brighter to were we were blind and then its like everyone blacked out and i remember me blinking a lot like i woke up and then a wave of cars started coming down the opposite side of the highway like someone pressed pause on reality, stopped time itself. everyone was freaking out and i was so calm and at peace in my mind and i noticed it changed me a lot in my mental thinking. i use to have trouble learning and paying attention and had no interest into anything to complex for the average person i was normal but after that day i can stop soaking in information, if i stop i get head aches, my talent in drawing changed in less than a month, i don't know if its natural or not ive just often thought about how different i felt in life like someone put a new me inside my old body, my school grades also improved exponentially to were i got to the point were i could miss weeks then show up for the test and get an a on it. since that night i have witnessed 14 different sightings, averaging about 4 a year and clean and clear sightings but in a strange way when i see them i'm not full of fear or questions but instead i feel understanding and comfort like its something i've been around or have known all along and the feeling of safety. please believe me i don't care for fame or recognition but answers and to let people know my kinda of people intelligent people
content.summary: Riding in car with family then a bright like overwhelmed the inside then woke up not one car around

content.detailedDescription: On saturday nov 22 at 6 pm to the south east, i saw something like i have never seen before. i saw a baton shaped craft that had white lights on each end and the middle was all black square windows. this thing turned end over end 3 times then came to a stop in the vertical position. while it was stopped it seemed to separate or get longer in length. at this point the lights went out and it dissappeared. there was no other air raft of any kind remotely near.
content.summary: Baton shape white lights at each end square black windows on body

content.detailedDescription: Witness sent his written statement to mufon regarding a men in black encounter he had in 1987. case on file.
content.summary: Mib encounter in 1987

content.detailedDescription:
Published on mar 17, 2014 

this video was taken @ 10:52 pm at a dog park on long lake rd in port orchard wa facing south / south east . also, i have identical footage that was taken at 6:39 pm at the same place with my wife and son on my nextel phone before we ate out earlier that evening . another friend later after watching the video said his coworker had shown him the same video taken from blake island ! note : earlier that afternoon i had performed a meditation to establish contact with other intelligent life or e.T.'s using ce-5 protocol ! we live in an exciting time ! bdii

published on oct 29, 2014 cell phone video , first initial viewing.

on the way to eat out my wife noticed these lights and we stopped to record them! my youngest son was also present as we observed the brilliant lights . the cell phone was a cheap lg and does little justice to the event, aside from the fact it was taken an hour or more prior to my already posted video of the same event on a separate camera . felt very magnetized to this viewing and was unsuprised by the display also very definite that my naked eyes were not witnessing a normal aircraft or helicopter / floating lantern due to the powerful wind that was coming directly from the direction of the lights position. unfortunately my hd video is on the hard drive of a computer that is being worked on and i can only view it through youtube as it has footage of a plane passing under the lights to give a better perspective !
                                     [witness name removed/cms/dr]

p.S.  full disclosure !
content.summary: Two brilliant hovering lights in a angled positioning in close proximity to one another , also seeming to rematerialize.

content.detailedDescription:
Fri evening about 5:00,  my wife  called me on her way home.  she noticed 3 lights in the sky
as she was coming  home from annapolis and still at least 5 miles away.  
i went into our back yard and noticed the 3 lights to the sw and slowly moving south. 
they were low in the sky and just  small spots in the sky.  i could not tell how distant,
but seemed to be a few miles.  i would guess perhaps 3-10 miles. 
 
because they were very strange,  i decided to go get binoculars to look at them.  they appeared to
be like lighted donuts,  but kind of fuzzy like a smoke ring,  but with the fat shape of a donut.  
the setting sun was probably creating the light coming from them.
 
since i had not seen anything like that before,  i went into the house to get my digital camera.
i set it at 10x zoom and got one photo before they disappeared entirely.  unfortunately,  i was
a little too late.  
 
i have attached that photo.  you can slightly see two of the three lights.  one looks like a little
light at the tip end of a tree branch near the middle of the photo.  another is about 8 o'clock 
from that one in the branches.  if you zoom in,  you can sort of see the donut shape.  when i first saw 
them closer to me,  the angle was better and the donut shape was more discernible.  
 
total time from when i got my wife's call until i took that picture was probably 5-8 minutes. 
 
i don't believe in aliens,  so i suspect there is a rational explanation to this.  but,  i have never seen
anything like it in my 73 years,  and, as a former pilot,  i watch the sky more than most people.    
 
the closest thing i have ever seen to this were "sundogs" but they were always quite different than
this.   these did not appear to be like any aircraft i have ever seen,  even lighter than air types.
content.summary: Slow moving lights near sunset

content.detailedDescription: Me & many of my friends & family have been witnessing an object that materializes out of the original object that has been hovering in the same spot the last month or so. this object has a star like quality but is in the earth's atmosphere. the object that appeared out of the original object was the same size & brightness, then just seemed to evaporate or vanish. i want a professional ufo researcher to investigate. it is here almost every single night over the lake cumberland, wolfcreek region in south central kentuck.
content.summary: Life altering

content.detailedDescription:
I was dead asleep and woke up to a loud jet sound and thought that was odd. so i opened my window looking to the east and saw what i thought was a plane
with pulsating red and white lights (3) and it was moving slowly but making that jet like sound. it was a very clear night with abundant stars out. then after about 30 seconds, it stopped above a power plant that is about 2 miles from my window and hovered there for about 4 1/2 more minutes. the oddest thing was that the power plant lights lit up really bright when this happened. then it moved slowly and a tree obscured my vision of it. then it disappeared (no more lights were seen. it was too far to notice what the body of the aircraft looked like. i didn't think to take a video with my phone. i was too tired and shocked by what i saw. i have seen another sighting in little bear canyon but that was in 1980. so i know they are out there :)
content.summary: Heard loud sound of a jet, woke up at 2:57 am looked and window to the east and saw the object flying east then hovering over an electrical plant. the lights lit up bright at the plant

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving n/b on the 110 fwy and i noticed a bright green star-like shape falling in a south to north direction, northwest from my position.  it did not have a tail like a shooting star.  my siting lasted about 2-3 seconds.  it just seemed to disappeared just like a shooting/falling star.  what made it unusual was its color.

the only feelings that i had was i wished i could have caught it on camera.
content.summary: It was like a falling star without a tail and bright green in color.

content.detailedDescription: At 3:45 pm on 11-22-2014 observed a ufo black circle like object or craft the size of a standard helicopter moving north east and ascending quickly from about a 1000 yards up when first sighted at orangewood and harbor it disappeared into the clouds within 5 min high above brea north oc area. my thoughts were a first that it was a helicopter but when it was flying it twisted and turned over and seemed to float like a really big balloon but the rapid speed it was ascending and moving for the wind speed would seem to fast if that was the case? the was another witness with me that filmed it on a tablet but im not sure how the video came out.I will ask her to check the footage today and see if we have anything
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Large black donut shape circle shaped object

content.detailedDescription: It was october 29 2014 @ approximately 2:10 am i was driving home from working afternoon shift and my eye caught a bright light off in the south east sky. i first thought it was a plane coming in for a landing i decided to keep an eye on it to see what kind of plane it would be but the light never got any closer or further away but continued to flicker and pulse from white to red to blue to yellow to green then repeat i wasn't sure what i was looking at so i decided to pull over just before my house and get out of my truck with my i phone 5s and video tape what i was seeing i kept the light in the middle of my phone screen while i was videoing the light its all i had to record with. after i got home i just sat there in my truck looking up into the sky wondering if what i saw was alien life form looking down on us. i looked back in the area it was in and it was gone . i,m still in awe over this and watch my video regularly
content.summary: Bright light caught my eye thought it was a plane coming in for landing but it never got closer or further

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on lynnhaven parkway when i noticed a steady light source with brightness of a streetlamp that appeared to be hovering over a neighborhood near salem hs at low altitude. light then began moving slowly and crossed over lynnhaven parkway. the light dimmed slightly then intensified and it accelerated very quickly out of view. i tried to take a picture with my smartphone camera but it didn't appear in the viewfinder. it 100% was not a plane/helicopter/meteor.
content.summary: Bright orange light

content.detailedDescription: Could not sleep so i went on deck. looking out over mountains and tree tops and noticed this large star. then noticed it seemed to be pulsating and changing color. then i noticed another one. went in house to get binoculars and looked closer. they seem to have a center light that is larger with smaller round lights spinning around the larger one. they rotate like a carnival ride. forward backward downward and upward.The prominent colors are blue green and red.Without binoculars they seem to stay in one place but with the binoculars you can see them move up and down and sideways. for the most part they stay in the same general location. i have seen these objects several times in the past two years.My family and friends see them also. they are beautiful to me but also make my imagination rage. sometimes they seem to disappear but come right back to same place. i never lose sight of them. i just stop watching them and go back inside.
content.summary: Not first time of sighting. seen several times. looks like a star at first  but very bright. with binoculars it is a large  round ball with multi-colored balls spinning around it.It turns in all directions.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10 when i heard an odd sound outside. i went outside to check what the noise was, as i went outside i noticed a star that appeared to be moving it made no noise. no blinking and didn't move in a particular pattern. i also noticed it was extremely quiet in our street, the dogs never seem to stop barking but tonight i could only hear the sound of a sprinkler. as i continued to stare at the object it went extremely bright. i felt paralysed. it disappeared soon after. i felt a huge level of fear unlike anything i have experienced in my life. as i walked through the door to go back inside i walked extremely slow like my legs couldn't pull themselves from the ground. i walked back inside still shaken from what i'd seen. i felt as if it was the end of the world. it was horrifying. most people are happy about seeing such a phenomena but i wanted to hide and pray it would go away. i see it every night but never that close, never that bright. i thought perhaps it's just a plane until i noticed how it moved and the light from tonight will be a traumatic experience i will never forget.   
(the star comes out every night after 9 o'clock, never gone that bright before. didn't have a camera on me and even if i did the paralysis i felt would be much like ufo amnesia)
content.summary: Bright light, moved in many different direction, looked much like a star

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work at about 230 a.M down a road called old spanish trail and i was looking up at the stars like i usually do when i saw a bright lime green shooting star, it had no tail & didnt shoot across the sky as far as ive seen other normal looking shooting stars go. the sighting only lasted about 3 seconds at most but i know it was bright lime green which immediatly struck me as weird because i have never seen a bright green shooting star and it didnt have a tail. the second i saw it i thought to myself "u.F.O". im not saying it looked like it was being controlled by intelligent beings or that it was a spaceship or flying saucer but i am saying ive seen alot of shooting stars and that did not look like any normal shooting star ive ever seen & id really like an explanation as to what it was that i saw.
content.summary: Bright lime green shooting star with no tail, i thought this was really strange.

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:40 pm i was driving from newport to bangor on highway 95 some were near the town of carmel, exit 174 when i saw a very very bright white light looked like a meteor kinda but lite up everything, the light was so intense it lit up every thing to the point it looked like day light for about 10 seconds or so then looked like it burned up and broke apart looked like white sparks then an orange ball of light grew from a single pin prick of light to about the size of a golf ball the orange light was kinda strange looking it was dull and fuzzy looking and had kind of a shimmer to it like static on a tv but instead of black and white dots it had dull orange and white static. also a whitish beam it hovered over the high way for about 15 mins then faded out from golf ball size to a pin point then disappeared completely no blinking lights at all. ask if you want more info! ps. please don't call my phone email if you need to contact me thanks!
content.summary: Bright white meteor looking craft stops turns into orange ball of light over highway 95

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at work at 07:55 south african time when a employee waited for me at the security gate to tell me what they have just seen ( they our staff member and one of our suppliers).

he informed me that they where stunned by what just happened. they where taking photos of a new trailer that was delivered when the spotted a silver object ( silver trail )(could not really see the object it self other than the silver streak behind).

two photos was taken before it disappeared in the distance within two minutes of spotting it on the horizon in the south east and losing it on the horizon in the north west.

both witnesses recall that it appeared to take off vertical at the same speed as it was flying away but that it shot up through the clouds moving slightly to avoid a cloud then turning 90 degrees and then shooting away towards the north east.

no sound could be heard at all. note this was at at 07:23 am with the sun rising in the east.

also note that the o r thambo international airport is just a few miles away from where the object was spotted.

this is the second time that this type of fast moving craft was spotted by my fellow employee , the first time i was with him and our whole company spotted 3 craft flying at such speeds but they left contrails looking like cork screw effect.

my feeling this was not a craft from here as it moved to fast.
content.summary: Object taking off vertical at high speed , turn 90 deg and sped of at high speed from both horizons in less than 2 min.

content.detailedDescription:
My oldest daughter (klassic) and i just got done watching fireworks that came from ontop of a nearby hill to the south of us.About 5 min. from the fireworks ending ; we noticed 2 bright orbs heading north over tree line. 
 if i held my arms out at a 45 deg. angle and put my two fists together , that would be the distance between each object. i then called for my children(s) mother to come out and witness this.By the time she got outside "they" were moving west. they turned west with a constant equal distance between them. one large object or two smaller objects..Mocking each other? they then disappeared out of sight.. to the west..  picture)s) were takin by klassics ipod.Blurry but basic shape is noticeable??..
content.summary: Two bright lights heading from south to west

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside from cleaning my garage and glanced toward the sky when i saw a bright orange ish shining light. noticed it appeared to be coming my way. it was moving slowly in a straight line, and eventually made its way directly over me. there was mo sound at any time. nothing but the light was visible as it was so bright. i watched it the entire time, and watched it as it flew away. constant, extremely bright light entire time. light appeared goldish-orangish to white. at first, i assumed it was a small plane, as county airport is nearby and planes fly over all the time during day and at night. but the bright light stuck me as not a plane, so i watched it at first thinking it was so bright as it was coming in my direction. discovered it was coming in my direction, but noticed it moving to slow to be a small prop plane, and noticed that the light stayed constantly bright. there was no other light, no blinking, no sound. it's speed did not ever appear to change either. realized i was seeing something that i didn't know what it was. watched until it disappeared through the trees in my backyard. moved from south, southwest to north, northwest, in apparent straight line; appeared to maintain the same distance from the ground the entire time; i'm guessing 500 feet high. still not sure what i saw. thought it could be drone due to the speed (i think that they can fly much slower than a piloted plane), but why would a drong have a single bright light calling attention to itself. i hope to hear someone else saw the same and maybe got a picture. have checked the web, but no mention so far. besides being chilled from the cold night air, it was a cool thing, but sort of freaky too. i went inside and told my wife and son. they seemed to be skeptical, and i don't blame them, but i know i saw something that wasn't anything like i've ever seen before. and reluctant as i am to say anything, i thought i should. i don't think i saw some alien craft (i'm just too skeptical of that), nor some phenomenon of nature. but, whatever it was, it was definitely out of the norm. tomorrow, i would like to call the county airport just a mile and learn if they picked anything up on radar, or have some explanation.
content.summary: Bright orange ish shining light flew slowly in straight line directly over. no sound at any time. first saw from a distance then watched it fly away. constant, extremely bright light entire time.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway and glanced up at the evening sky while unlocking my car door and noticed an object similar to a meteor as it had a long flaming tail moving constantly but slightly left to right and back again as it crossed above but moving much slower than a meteor as it crossed the early evening sky. it would be hard to determine with certainty how high this object was above us but i would guess the object was at least a mile or above the ground it seemed to be arching slightly downwards as it crossed the sky. no sound was heard as the object passed overhead. i mentioned to my neighbors and their friends who were also outside if they are seeing what i do and all confirmed my sighting. five others besides myself watched as the object crossed the sky. the object took 5 or six seconds to exit our field of view but just before doing so behind the rooftops of nearby houses the object made a sudden change of direction before disappearing beyond our field of view.
content.summary: Meteor like object moving slowly across evening sky with flaming tail

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on cason trail in murfreesboro at 5:59 or 6 pm central time. as i approached the intersection of cason lane, a light in the sky to the east/northeast caught my attention.  it appeared to be at least a few miles from me.  at first i assumed it was a plane but quickly changed my assumption to a meteor, as it began to appear to be a white to yellow streak, but then the streak seemed to resolve to a trail with what appeared to be a orange fireball heading east at the head of it.  of course it would still appear to be a meteor, but it seemed to be moving too slow and burning too long, as i observed it in this state for nearly 20 seconds.  i was further confounded when it took a sudden turn toward the south, still leaving a trail.  i only saw it for another 3 or 4 seconds before i lost it behind some houses and trees.  i hurriedly crossed the street and attempted to relocate it but did not.  after dwelling on it for a few minutes, i began to have a horrible feeling that it may have been an airplane that had somehow caught fire.  however, over the last few hours i have checked local news sites for news of a plane emergency or crash and have found nothing.  i decided to report it here, hoping someone else may have seen it or even filmed it.  i did not attempt to photograph it because i was in the car driving and figured my phone wouldn't get a good pic or video anyway.
content.summary: Apparent fireball leaving trail moving slower than meteor, abrupt change of direction
